alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 14 at 1:19AM CST until December 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN HOLMES AND NORTHEASTERN YAZOO COUNTIES... At 119 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Benton, or near Yazoo City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Coxburg around 135 AM CST. Ebenezer and Brozville around 140 AM CST. Franklin and Pickens around 150 AM CST. Goodman around 155 AM CST. Durant around 205 AM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
